name: Apple
description: Fresh and crisp, apples are a timeless choice. Perfect for snacks or baking, they offer a sweet flavor with a hint of tartness and are packed with antioxidants and fiber.

name: Strawberry
description: Sweet and vibrant, strawberries are bursting with antioxidants and vitamin C. Add them to desserts, salads, or enjoy them straight from the basket.

name: Grape
description: Grapes are a delightful snack, rich in antioxidants and natural sugars. Perfect for eating on their own or adding a sweet touch to cheese platters.

name: Cherry
description: Sweet and tart, cherries are rich in antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds. Enjoy them as a snack or add a burst of flavor to desserts.

name: Pear
description: Juicy and sweet, pears are packed with fiber and vitamins. Enjoy them fresh, poached, or baked for a delightful treat any time of day.

name: Blueberry
description: Small but mighty, blueberries are rich in antioxidants and essential nutrients. Add them to cereals, yogurt, or blend into smoothies for a nutritious boost.

name: Carrot
description: Vibrant and crunchy, carrots are packed with beta-carotene for healthy eyes and skin. Enjoy raw, juiced, or cooked in soups and stews.

name: Broccoli
description: Nutrient-rich broccoli offers a mild, earthy flavor and is packed with vitamins K and C. Perfect for roasting, steaming, or adding to stir-fries.

name: Tomato
description: Juicy and versatile, tomatoes are rich in lycopene for heart health and antioxidants for overall well-being. Essential for sauces, salads, and sandwiches.

name: Spinach
description: Leafy and nutrient-packed, spinach is rich in iron and vitamins A and C. Enjoy fresh in salads, saut√©ed as a side dish, or blended into smoothies.

name: Cucumber
description: Cool and hydrating, cucumbers are low in calories and packed with antioxidants. Perfect for salads, sandwiches, or enjoyed as a refreshing snack.

name: Lettuce
description: Crisp and refreshing, lettuce is low in calories and rich in vitamins A and K. Perfect for fresh salads, wraps, or sandwiches.
